programme.desc: 與世界同步，關心你的財富。站在台灣投資人的角度，放眼國際金融市場，提供好看、好懂、好用的國際財經新聞和理財資訊。陪伴觀眾一起，觀測全球市場的風險與機會，掌握影響財富變化的國際脈動。

programme.title: 鏡新聞調查報告
programme.desc: 我們直視爭議議題，對你我關心的國內外重要新聞事件，深入調查剖析。雖然真相往往得來不易，但我們會像剝洋蔥般，為你所關心的議題抽絲剝繭。重磅內容，由最精銳資深的專題團隊製作，針對重大議題，邀請焦點人物，親上火線，不讓官員迴避，不忽略最底層聲音。

programme.title: African Voices Changemakers: Gospel Music in Africa
programme.desc: Gospel music's appeal is rising globally, and two Nigerians are leading the pack in Sub-Saharan Africa - Nathaniel Bassey and Mercy Chinwo.

programme.title: Marketplace Africa: Angola's Budding Digital Economy; Pedro Beirao
programme.desc: A budding start-up ecosystem in Angola drives a digital revolution in the country; Appy Saude's CEO on why he believes they are providing a vital service to the public.

programme.title: Marketplace Asia: HMC Innovation Center; Durian Exports

programme.title: A Fareed Zakaria Special: The United States vs. Iran: A Fareed Zakaria Special

programme.title: My Happy Place: Simu Liu in Thailand

programme.title: Tech for Good: Nature Inspiring Tech of Tomorrow
programme.desc: Meet the students using the building blocks of our natural world to help build the technology of the future. From insect robots that weigh less than a gram to a 'tortoise' robot that could one day be used in space, we travel the globe to see how young minds are harnessing the power of nature.

programme.title: Inside Africa: "Green" Ghana: Social Entrepreneurs
programme.desc: Ghana's social impact entrepreneurs and the ecosystem supporting them are shaping Ghana's sustainability credentials in agriculture.
